lead_paragraph: Needing to raise nearly $4.2 million by July 1 to save its storied men’s track program, the team is turning to fund-raising and the search for possible endowment money.
snippet: Needing to raise nearly $4.2 million by July 1 to save its storied men’s track program, the team is turning to fund-raising and the search for possible endowment money.
